57308.「ホーローさまが 現れませんか……。\n また 壊れてしまったのかも しれません:
Master Hollow hasn't shown up yet? I wonder
if the device has broken again... If that's
the case, I'm sure Mr. Bajeo will fix it.

57310.「おや。何か 反応があるようです。: Oh. There seems to be a signal coming in.

57312.「ホーローさまの お声のようです。\n いかがなさいました ホーローさま？:
That sounds like Master Hollow. Is everything
all right over there?

57315.「……通信が 切れてしまいました。\n どうやら ホーローさまの身に\n 何か:
Looks like we lost the signal... something
must've happened to him.

57316.「これは 困りましたね。\n ホーローさまが用意なさった 試練の内容は\n ホー:
This isn't good... only Master Hollow knows
the details of the trial he's been entrusted
with.

57317.「……どうやら <pc>さまの\n おチカラを お借りするしかないようですね。\:
I'll need to ask for your help once more.
Can you go and check on Master Hollow to
see if he is safe?

57318.「ホーローさまの無事が確認されましたら\n 破邪の秘技の試練を受けて\n それを:
Once you know he is safe, he can fill you in
on the details of his trial.

57319.「私は ここを動けませんし\n ホーローさまの居場所も わかりかねます。\n 心:
I can't leave here, and we don't know if
he is safe... please try to find him, won't
you?

57320.「それでは よろしくお願いいたします。\n <pc>さま。: I wish you the best of luck.

57321.「……失礼ですが <pc>さまは\n 他に多くの頼まれごとを 抱えておられますね:
Apologies, but it seems that you're already
occupied with too many requests at the
moment.

57322.「申し訳ありませんが そちらを処理されてから\n もう一度 私の所へ来ていただけ:
I'm sorry to ask, but once you've taken care
of those other requests, can you please come
back and speak with me again?

57323.「……お断りになるのですか。\n 事態は 緊急を要するかもしれません。\n でき:
You truly cannot...? The situation may be
quite dire... so please reconsider your
answer if possible.

57325.「……やはり ホーローさまの身に\n 何か 起こったと見て まちがいありません。:
I'm certain that something must've happened
to Master Hollow...

57326.「<pc>さまの おチカラを\n お借りしなければ ならないようです。\n ホー:
I'm afraid I need to ask you for your help on
this matter. Can you please confirm that he is
safe?

57327.「ホーローさまの無事が確認されましたら\n 破邪の秘技の試練を受けて\n それを:
Once you know he is safe, he can fill you in
on the details of his trial.

57328.「おーう。<pc>ではないか。\n もしかして わしの心配をして\n ここまで:
Aye! If it isn't <pc>. Perhaps
ya were worried 'bout me and came ta see
if I was safe?

57329.「いやあ すまんかったな。\n 呼びだされたとき ちょうど\n 熱いバトルの 真:
Sorry 'bout that, <if_woman>lassie<else>laddie<endif>. I was right in the
middle of a heated battle when you were
callin'.

57330.「こいつが その戦利品じゃよ。最後のひとつを\n ライバルと奪い合って そりゃも:
This here's the spoils of my victory. T'was a
dangerous battle of survival as I fought with
my rival fer the last one!

57331.「あやうく 負けそうになったが\n 最後の最後で 会心の逆転イオナズンが\n 見:
I almost lost, but at the last second, a last
ditch reverse Kaboom dealt a critical hit!

57332.「……まあ ちぃと 大げさに言ったが\n それくらい 白熱したということじゃ。:
Well, maybe it didn't go quite like that,
but... t'was still quite heated.

57333.「おおっ すまん すまん。\n おぬしの用件は わかっておるぞ。\n 破邪の秘技:
Sorry, <if_woman>lassie<else>laddie<endif>. I know what ya want. Ye wish
ta learn the Sacred Skill.

57334.「大魔王や その眷属と戦うには\n 破邪の秘技は 必須と言えるものじゃからな。:
In order ta fight the Demon Lord and his
army, the Sacred Skills are indispensable.

57335.「わしが あずかる秘技は 『勇者の心』。\n 勇者の持つ勇気の心を 仲間に分けあ:
My Sacred Skill is called "Hero's Heart".
Sharin' a heart of courage from the Hero to
their ally draws upon a great power.

57336.「その会得のため 闘志の試練を受けてもらうぞ。\n 内容は いたってシンプルじゃ:
Ta learn it, ya gotta undergo the Trial
of Spirit. It's simple. All ya gotta do is
fight the monster and beat 'em!

57337.「<pc>は 勇者の盟友なんじゃから\n アンルシアちゃんとともに\n 試練の魔:
Since you're the Hero's Ally, ya
gotta fight the monster together with Anlucia.

57338.「真のレンダーシアの リンジャハル海岸に建つ\n リンジャの塔の最上階に 試練の:
The monster will be on the top
floor of Linja Tower. Ya know, the one in the
Linjahar Coast in the true Lendersia.

57339.「次は～ アズラン～ アズラン～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合いは\n 危:
Next stop, Azlan. Please refrain from rushing
onto the train to compete over the station
lunches, as it may cause injury.

57340.「次は～ 王都カミハルムイ～ カミハルムイ～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合:
Next stop, Kamiharmui. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57341.「次は～ 岳都ガタラ～ ガタラ～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合いは\n 危:
Next stop, Gatara. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57342.「次は～ ドルワーム王国～ ドルワーム王国～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合:
Next stop, Dolworm Kingdom. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57343.「次は～ オルフェア～ オルフェア～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合いは\n:
Next stop, Orphea. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57344.「次は メギストリスの都 メギストリスの都。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合い:
Next stop, Megistris City. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57345.「次は～ ジュレット～ ジュレット～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合いは\n:
Next stop, Julet. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57346.「次は～ ヴェリナード城～ ヴェリナード城～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合:
Next stop, Verinard Castle. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57347.「次は～ グレン城～ グレン城～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合いは\n 危:
Next stop, Glen Castle. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57348.「次は～ ガートラント城～ ガートラント城～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合:
Next stop, Gartlant Castle. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57349.「次は～ 娯楽島ラッカラン～ ラッカラン～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合い:
Next stop, Luckland Island. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57350.「次は～ 港町レンドア～ レンドア～。\n 駆け込み乗車と 駅弁の取り合いは\n:
Next stop, Port Lendor. Please refrain
from rushing onto the train to compete over
the station lunches, as it may cause injury.

57351.「……おお もう着いてしまうのか。\n わしは この駅弁を まだ食い終わらんので:
Oh, are we already there? I haven't finished
eatin' this yet. Guess I'll stay on the train
a bit longer.

57352.「試練のことは アンルシアちゃんにも\n 伝えておくから リンジャの塔に向かうが:
I'll let Anlucia know 'bout the trials, too.
Head on over to Linja Tower. Adios!

57353.「ふがっ？ なんじゃ <pc>か。\n 試練の内容を もう一度 聞きたいんじゃな:
Hmm? What is it? You want to hear about the
trial again?

57354.「よいか。アンルシアちゃんが\n 破邪の秘技 『勇者の心』を会得するには\n 闘:
Let's see. In order for Anlucia to master the
Sacred Skill "Hero's Heart", she has
to pass the Trial of Spirit.

57355.「アンルシアちゃんとともに 真のレンダーシアの\n リンジャハル海岸にある リン:
You and Anlucia must defeat the monster
on the top floor of Linja Tower, located on
the Linjahar Coast in the true Lendersia.

57356.「試練についての くわしい話は\n すでに アンルシアちゃんにしておいたんで\n:
I've already given Anlucia the details of the
trial, so you'll have to go there and ask
her.

57357.「では <pc>よ。\n ガッツで がんばるがよい。:
Now go, <pc>!
Go and give it your all!

57358.「<cs_pchero> 準備は いいかしら。\n あそこにいるのが 試練の魔物: Are you ready? That's the monster over there.

57359.「ホーローさまから 話は聞いてるわ。\n あの魔物は 私たちの心を惑わす技を\n:
Hollow explained it to me. That monster will
use a technique to deceive our hearts.

57360.「その技を受けてしまうと 相手に\n ダメージを与えられなくなるらしいの。:
If it hits you, then you won't be able to
deal any damage at all.

57361.「なんとかして その技を打ち消す方法を\n 考えないと 勝つことは難しそうだけど:
It will be quite difficult figuring out how
I can counteract that... What should I
do...?

57363.「……ゆっくり 相談しているヒマはなさそうね。\n 私は 戦いながら 方法を考え:
There's no time to think about it. I'll
think of a way while we fight.
<cs_pchero>, you deal with the monster!

57365.「<cs_pchero> よく聞いて！\n この魔物は 私たちの心を惑わす技を\:
Listen to me, <cs_pchero>! That
monster will use a technique to deceive our
hearts!

57366.「その技を受けると 相手に\n ダメージを与えられなくなってしまうの。:
If it hits you, then you won't be able to
deal any damage to it at all.

57367.「私は 戦いながら 技を打ち消す方法を\n なんとか 考えてみるわ。:
I'll try to think of a way to counteract it
as we fight.

57368.「だから <cs_pchero>には\n それまでの間 魔物の相手をお願いしたい:
Until then, do your best to keep its
attention!

57370.「やっぱり あの技を受けたままでは\n あの魔物を倒すことは できないわね……。:
I knew it... we can't beat him if he keeps
using that technique on us...

57374.「ならば 私が みんなの勇気をふるい起こせれば\n あんな技に負けない 勇気の心:
If I can sway everyone's courage, my heart
will also fill with that same courage. We
can overcome that technique!

68588.「この戦いの間 私は ずっと考えてた。\n 勇者とは 何者なのかということを……:
While we've been fighting, I've been thinking
about what a Hero truly is...

68589.「勇者とは 勇気ある者のこと。\n でも 勇気は 私だけにあるものじゃない。\n:
A Hero is supposed to have courage. But that's
not something only I have... courage lies
within all of us.

68591.「……はあ はあ。\n 試練の魔物に 勝つことができたのね。\n <cs_pch:
*Huff, huff*... we managed to defeat it. It's
all thanks to your help...

68592.「これは……。私の中に チカラが\n わいてくるのが わかる……。: I can feel... a power surging within me...

68593.どこからともなく 声が聞こえる……。: A voice was heard from out of nowhere...

68594.<center>やっほー アンルシアちゃん。\n試練の魔物に 打ち勝ったようじゃ:
Aye, Anlucia! Ya' defeated the monster of
the trial! Marvelous and amazing, lassie!

68595.<center>よしよし。闘志の試練をクリアしたことを\n叡智の冠のひとり ホー:
Alright, you two! In the name of Hollow,
Sage of the Crown of Wisdom, I hereby declare
ya both have passed the trial!

68596.「ありがとうございます ホーローさま。\n でも 私じゃなく <cs_pcher:
Thank you... but I think you should praise
<cs_pchero> here, not me.

68597.<center>それで いいんじゃよ。\n勇者とは 自ら剣を振るうだけの者を\n:
Aye, no worries. A Hero ain't just someone
who just swings a sword around.

68598.<center>ともに戦う 盟友や仲間を信頼し \nそのチカラを引きだすことが:
A true Hero is one who trusts their Ally and
companions, and draws on their strength ta
fight alongside 'em.

68599.「はい。ホーローさま。\n そのお言葉を 心に 刻んでおきます。: Understood. I will take your words to heart.

68600.勇者姫アンルシアは 破邪の秘技のひとつ\n『勇者の心』を 会得した！<me 71:
Anlucia has learned the "Hero's Heart",
one of the Sacred Skills!<me 71>

68601.<center>さて。試練は終わったが <cs_pchero>よ。\nおぬしは:
Well, the trial's over now. Can ya return to
the meetin' room? We got more ta discuss.

68602.<center>おっと いかん。\n限定品の弁当を買わねばならぬので\nこれにて:
Ah, fiddlesticks! I gotta go buy a limited
edition lunchbox, so I'll leave ya to it!

68603.「ありがとう <cs_pchero>。\n あなたのおかげで 破邪の秘技を会得で:
Thanks to you, I was able to master this
Sacred Skill. Don't forget, we're gathering
in the meeting room.

68604.「……むう。この期間限定 五種族盛り弁当は\n なかなか デリシャスじゃのう！:
Mmm! This limited time lunchbox with
five kinds o' food is quite delicious!

68605.「五種族をイメージした 旬の食材が\n お互いの味をフォローしつつ とろけるよう:
The seasonal ingredients inspired by the five
races all come together to combine their
flavors in perfect harmony!

68607.「闘志の試練が終わり 疲れているところを\n 呼んだりして すまなかったのう。\:
Sorry to call ya here after yer trial. I
just wanted ta have a little chat with ya.

68608.「最初に おぬしと 大地の箱舟で会ってから\n どれくらいの時が 過ぎたかのう…:
Ah, how long has it been since I first met
ya on the Ark of the Earth...

68609.「……じつはな。わしは あの時から\n おぬしには 何か 勇者に つながる\n:
Since I first met ya, I always had some kinda
feelin' you had a connection to the Hero.

68610.「ゆえに レンダーシアへと 向かわせるべく\n あれやこれやと やってもらったん:
That's why I had to do everythin' in my power
to get ya to Lendersia.

68611.「まさか おぬしが 勇者の盟友であったとは\n わしの見る目は なんと スペシャ:
I had no idea that ya were the Hero's Ally!
My judgement's unparalleled!

68612.「いやいや 真に グレートかつ\n ワンダフルなのは おぬしのほうじゃな。:
I'm just pullin' yer leg. It's YOU who's truly
great and special!

68613.「とにもかくにも わしが目をかけた若者が\n こんなに 立派になってくれて うれ:
Anyway, I'm glad ta see that the youth I
took notice of turned out ta be such an
inspiration!

68614.「今回の試練の報酬を 用意してある。\n わしからの せんべつも兼ねて\n 受け:
I got a reward for ya. Please take it as a
token of my appreciation.

68615.「<pc>さま。こちらが\n ホーローさまより おあずかりした報酬です。\n ど:
Here is the reward from Master Hollow.
Please accept it.

68616.「<pc>よ。おぬしの\n これからの活躍にも 大いに期待しておるぞ。:
I have high expectations fer yer future
endeavors, <pc>.

68617.「さて。わしは もうしばらく\n ぶらり箱舟の旅と シャレ込むとするかの。\n:
Well then, I'm gonna pretend I'm still on a
train trip fer a little while longer.
Hohohoho!
